constant.name: Constant
constant.description: Checks if a variable has the exact same value as a constant. Can check constants from object instances as well.

defined.name: Defined
defined.description: Checks if a variable is defined in the current context.

divisibleby.name: Divisibleby
divisibleby.description: Checks if a variable is divisible by a number.

empty.name: Empty
empty.description: Checks if a variable is an empty string, empty array, empty hash, exactly false, or exactly null.

even.name: Even
even.description: Checks if the given number is even.

iterable.name: Iterable
iterable.description: Checks if a variable is an array or a traversable object.

null.name: Null
null.description: Checks if the variable is null.

odd.name: Odd
odd.description: Checks if the given number is odd.

sameas.name: Sameas
sameas.description: Checks if a variable is the same as another variable. Equivalent to '===' in PHP.
